explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of deep learning methods for forecasting the Shanghai Containerized Freight Index, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The study employs deep learning techniques, specifically combining LSTM and CNN architectures, to analyze and forecast the SCFI.
explanations.neural network: The research involves the use of neural networks, as both LSTM and CNN are types of neural networks.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of CNN (Convolutional Neural Network) as part of the proposed model.
explanations.CNN: The abbreviation CNN is used in the abstract to refer to the Convolutional Neural Network component of the model.
explanations.long short-term memory: The abstract mentions the use of LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) networks to capture long-term temporal dependencies in the data.
explanations.LSTM: The abbreviation LSTM is used in the abstract to refer to the Long Short-Term Memory component of the model.
explanations.representation learning: The deep learning model used in the study inherently involves representation learning to find nonlinear dynamics in the SCFI dataset.
